advanced.customFooterCode:
<script>
  if ( window.location.href.endsWith( 'notarstefano.com/' ) || window.location.href.endsWith( 'notarstefano.com' ) || window.location.href.endsWith( '/preview/index.html' ) ) {

  	var postEl = document.getElementsByClassName('post__entry')[0];
  	postEl.parentNode.removeChild(postEl);
 
  	document.body.style.background = "#17181E";
  	
    document.getElementsByClassName('hero')[0].style.height = "100vh";
  	document.getElementsByClassName('footer')[0].style.margin = "0 auto";
  	document.getElementsByClassName('footer')[0].style.padding = "1vh 6vw";
  
    document.getElementsByClassName('hero__content')[0].classList.add('home-page');
  
    var footer = document.getElementsByClassName('footer')[0];
  	footer.parentNode.removeChild(footer);
  }
</script>
advanced.customFooterAmpCode:
<script>
  if ( window.location.href.endsWith( 'notarstefano.com/' ) || window.location.href.endsWith( 'notarstefano.com' ) || window.location.href.endsWith( '/preview/index.html' ) ) {

  	var postEl = document.getElementsByClassName('post__entry')[0];
  	postEl.parentNode.removeChild(postEl);
 
  	document.body.style.background = "#17181E";
  	
    document.getElementsByClassName('hero')[0].style.height = "100vh";
  	document.getElementsByClassName('footer')[0].style.margin = "0 auto";
  	document.getElementsByClassName('footer')[0].style.padding = "1vh 6vw";
  
    document.getElementsByClassName('hero__content')[0].classList.add('home-page');
  
    var footer = document.getElementsByClassName('footer')[0];
  	footer.parentNode.removeChild(footer);
  }
</script>

gdpr.popupDesc: Select which cookies to opt-in to via the checkboxes below; our website uses cookies to examine site traffic and user activity while on our site, for marketing, and to provide social media functionality.
